oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New laundry on West End Avenue, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about a new laundry business on West End Avenue. The caption reads: “Using thousands of dollars worth of material, a new laundry is being constructed on West End Avenue. The demand for building material this year is likely to set a record, according to contractors.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Commercial buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Laundries--Tennessee--Nashville
